title: Music of the Ancient World
description:
Here is a good collection of music from the pre-Christian world. Sound quality varies widely, but all is at least 320 kb:

Ambient Egypt -- New Age synthesizers mixed with ancient cymbals and string instruments. Not period correct, but very soothing.

Ancient Egypt -- a reconstruction of his ancestors&#039; music by a renowned modern Arab musician.

Ancient Sumerians/Egyptians/Greeks -- a reconstruction of the few fragments of actual music that survived the ancient world, played on period instruments.

Ankh -- another interpretation of ancient Egyptian music and song.

Music from Ancient Rome -- this folder contains the tracks for both of Synaulia&#039;s CD&#039;s, one each for string and wind instruments.

Enjoy! And if you like what you hear, please do support the artists and buy the CD&#039;s!
